doc.title: Double Skin/Double Mind
doc.plot: The reference point for this documentary is Double Skin/Double Mind, a dance workshop created by choreographers Emio Greco and Pieter C. Scholten. Film director Maite Bermúdez, editor Viviana García Besné and cameraman Javier Allegue have used the words and philosophical ideas of EG/PC to achieve a creative view of their work, relating dance and film. This documentary shows the human side of a dance workshop and captures changes to the dancers' expectations, curiosity, and comprehension.
